page.title: 17UPWOOD MANOR (PART 2)
page.content:
Mrs. Woodward's house used to be a barn. It was covered in dirt. They stripped it down to the wooden structure and rebuilt it. It had a small row of rooms built onto the barn. No-one ever lived in the barn. They used the row of rooms as a place for trading animals. There was a fire in the middle of the room and the smoke went out of the roof. The beam over the fire-place had three roses carved out of the wood. There used to be cows im the barn. There is a hole in the garden. Mrs. Woodward puts leaves in it but it sinks down. We think it is the tunnel that leads to the Methodist Church.
by Ella
